title: weird ping issue
body: I had this weird issue in one of my games where I kept ddossing and lagging hard, my character would just be a standing target for the enemy team to be killed, I was assuming it was my ping but when i kept looking at it it kept showing I had 52 ping. Anyone know what this is?

replies.body:
What you're describing are common symptoms of *Packet Loss* or *extreme packet buffering*. These problems are most often caused by problematic network settings that conflict with League. I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all of your local network settings are okay.

Let me know if this resolved the issue!
Thanks, it seems to have worked so far. I'll keep an eye out if there is any more problems

If you go to the link he provided that troubleshoots network problems, you can possibly find the issue that you're having, which is probably packet loss, and use the program provided to help fix the problem.

Hi, I am having the same issue. The game was fine up until the the update on Wednesday. Ever since then, whenever I'm in a game, it shows me at having around 64 ping but the game itself feels like its at 150-200. I have already tried flushing the DNS which fixed my patching issues when the Beta Client was released, but it is not fixing this issue.
